name.description: The name (also called Instance Id in the Cloud Console

cluster.description: A block of cluster configuration options. This can be specified 1 or 2 times. See structure below.

project.description: The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it

instance_type.description: The instance type to create. One of `"DEVELOPMENT"` or `"PRODUCTION"`. Defaults to `"PRODUCTION"`.

display_name.description: The human-readable display name of the Bigtable instance. Defaults to the instance `name`.

cluster_id.description: The ID of the Cloud Bigtable cluster.

zone.description: The zone to create the Cloud Bigtable cluster in. Each

num_nodes.description: The number of nodes in your Cloud Bigtable cluster.

storage_type.description: The storage type to use. One of `"SSD"` or
